name: HERRESHOFF 12 1/2
notes:
The original boats were built by Herreshoff Manufacturing beginning in 1914. 
From 1943 to 1948 some boats were built by Cape Cod Shipbuilding as well as Quincy Adams Yacht Yard.
Not long afterward, Cape Cod Shipbuilding came out with the BULLSEYE, built of fiberglass, with a similar hull but a different rig.
The DOUGDISH, (one of the many nicknames previously associated with the class)is a faithful rendition of the 12 1/2, first built in 1972 of fiberglass by Doughdish Inc. Nearly 100 have been built. They were soon recognized by the class and race with the remaining original 12 1/2's to this day.
Spinnaker SA: 140 sq. ft.
